mapper.insert:
insert into tSheet (CarNo, carSubmit, carSubmitTel, salesman, chk1, date, sheetSS) values (#{CarNo}, #{carSubmit}, #{carSubmitTel}, #{salesman}, 1, #{date}, #{sheetSS})
select last_insert_id() as sheetID
mapper.select: select sheetID, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, CarNo, carSubmit, salesman, carSubmitTel from tSheet where carSubmitTel=#{carSubmitTel}
select carSubmit, carSubmitTel, salesman from tSheet where carSubmit like CONCAT('%', #{carSubmit}, '%') group by carSubmit order by carSubmit asc;
select carSubmit, carSubmitTel, salesman from tSheet where carSubmitTel like CONCAT('%', #{carSubmitTel}, '%') group by carSubmitTel order by carSubmitTel asc;
select carSubmit, carSubmitTel, salesman from tSheet where salesman like CONCAT('%', #{salesman}, '%') group by salesman order by salesman asc;
select chk1 from tSheet where sheetID=#{sheetID}
